meanings.sent1: The snake's venomed fangs injected poison into its prey.
meanings.sent2: The venomed spider bite caused swelling and pain.
meanings.sent3: The venomed apple looked harmless but packed a deadly surprise.
meanings.sent4: Her words were like venomed arrows, piercing his heart with malice.
meanings.sent5: The venomed dart struck the target with deadly accuracy.

meanings.sent1: The venomed sac of the spider held a potent toxin.
meanings.sent2: The venomed stinger of the scorpion delivered a painful sting.
meanings.sent3: The venomed potion was a dangerous concoction best avoided.
meanings.sent4: The venomed trap was set to catch unsuspecting prey.
meanings.sent5: The venomed plant secreted a toxic substance to deter predators.

meanings.sent1: The venomed wound caused excruciating pain.
meanings.sent2: The venomed victim sought immediate medical attention.
meanings.sent3: The venomed prank left a bitter taste in everyone's mouth.
meanings.sent4: The venomed insult stung more than any physical injury.
meanings.sent5: The venomed attack left a lasting scar on the survivor.
